ingredients: 4 cups fresh blackberries,   +   3/4 cup white sugar, divided,   +   1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 (9 inch) double crust ready-to-use pie crust, 2 tablespoons milk
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 2g 10%, Cholesterol 0mg 0%, Sodium 119mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 5g 16%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 15mg 76%, Calcium 29mg 2%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 145mg 3%
